org.jcvlib.core

Class Region

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jcvlib.core.Region

  • public class Region
extends java.lang.Object
    Region is a structure that contains some characteristics of image region.
    Author:
    Dmitriy Zavodnikov (d.zavodnikov@gmail.com)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Region(Image regionImage, Color targetColor)
      Calculate some characteristics of filled region.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getAreaSize()
      Return number of pixels into current region.
      Point getCentroid()
      Return centroid (point on image) of current region.
      double getEllipseMaxAxisLength()
      Return length (in pixels) of maximal ellipse axis.
      double getEllipseMaxAxisOrientation()
      Return max axis orientation ellipse (in radian) with regard to X-axis.
      double getEllipseMinAxisLength()
      Return length (in pixels) of minimal ellipse axis.
      int getRegionHeight()
      Return region size.
      int getRegionWidth()
      Return region size.
      int getRegionX()
      Return minimal region position.
      int getRegionY()
      Return minimal region position.
      double getSecondOrderColumnMoment()
      Return second-order column (X-axis) moment.
      double getSecondOrderMixedMoment()
      Return second-order mixed (X- and Y-axis) moment.
      double getSecondOrderRowMoment()
      Return second-order row (Y-axis) moment.
      java.lang.String toString()

      • Region

        public Region(Image regionImage,
      Color targetColor)
        Calculate some characteristics of filled region.
        Parameters:
        regionImage - Source image that will be processed.
        targetColor - Color that define region on source image.
